name: Agent Pablo
description:
Here's a story that started in a cold and secret base where vicious experiments on chickens were conducted by secret cactus agents. Despite all odds however, one fearless feathered lady managed to escape her captors with a stolen jetpack.
Nevertheless she was not yet free, not while the green forces were on her trails.
One particular agent swore to bring her back no matter the costs... 

Join our beloved characters, Agent Pablo and Samantha in this funny and challenging endless arcade game.
Scared from the chase, Samantha is laying eggs that you need to shrink before they hit the ground.
A fun and immersive game that will keep you busy for a while and make you wonder how their story will continue.
